text: Money from the Air () is a 1954 West German musical comedy film directed by Géza von Cziffra and starring Josef Meinrad, Lonny Kellner, and Grethe Weiser. The film's sets were designed by Albrecht Becker and Herbert Kirchhoff. ==Cast== ==References == == Bibliography == * == External links == * Category:1954 films Category:1954 musical comedy films Category:German musical comedy films Category:West German films Category:German-language films Category:Films directed by Géza von Cziffra Category:1954 comedy films
title: Money from the Air
